BR_text.BRsummary: [Style Error] Do not hardcode important constants
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/master/gst/tensor_transform/tensor_transform.c#L290>https://github.com/nnsuite/nnstreamer/blob/master/gst/tensor_transform/tensor_transform.c#L290</denchmark-link>
 
 has specific 4 instead of MAX_RANK macro. Please use macro instead of hard coded values.
